resources.string: Libraries required for Hexagon DSP are missing. Refer to this page for more information.
To be able to run inference using Hexagon DSP, the model must be quantized.
Hexagon Delegate is not supported on this device.
Auto mode uses the first acceleration type that is found (in runtime, in the order of Hexagon DSP \-> GPU \-> None) to be supported by the camera, the app, and the model.

Hexagon DSP mode delegates the execution of the model to the DSP available on some Qualcomm SoCs. Any unsupported operations will run on the CPU. Please note that for this acceleration to work, you need to add the Hexagon libraries to your app.
GPU mode delegates the execution of the model to the GPU on the device, if available. Any unsupported operations will run on the CPU.
No acceleration will be applied. The model will run entirely on the CPU.
NNAPI mode delegates the execution of the model to a combination of hardware (i.e. GPU, DSP and/or NPU), as determined by the operating system on the device.
Detector was initialized with acceleration type %1$s.
Detector could not be initialized with acceleration type %1$s - %2$s
Could not get the status after setting user preferences due to thread interruption.
